text.sentence: Good to know that you landed safely.
I had a lot of fun this weekend especially watching Golmaal3 :).
Here is what I remember about the expenses.
Mike : all gas + most of the toll + 2 metrocards + tickets to Statue of Liberty
I think I paid somebody in cash for lunch on saturday but I dont remember 100%
Pl. add to the list and let me know how much money I owe each of you :).
